name: HorrorStory
0:
”Alexa, open horror story”
”Alexa, ask horror story to tell me a horror story”
”Alexa, ask horror story to tell me a short horror story”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: horror story
des: This skill will narrate a spine chilling horror story, story is short but will experience goosebumps of fear.Users can simply say "Alexa open horror story" or " Alexa, ask horror story to tell me a horror story " and can experience goosebumps of fear.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
